profile:
We manage to cover a wide territory from Ottawa, Barrie, North Bay, New Liskeard and over to Sudbury. The North Bay crowd might remember us as “Computer Services ‘N More”, with the expansion of the Ottawa division we changed our name to North Bay Computer Services Inc. In 2010, we acquired Danny’s Computer Services clientele and incorporated our business. In 2012 we acquired North Bay Computer Repair.  In 2012 we received Small Business of the Year. Since then our service staff has doubled in size and we continue to offer great services for your technology needs.

North Bay Computer Services is a premier service provider. We take great pride in our many product lines and are always looking for ways to improve the products we offer and our services.

In 2012 North Bay Computer Services received Small Business of the Year, in 2013 Received Northern Ontario Award Judges Choice Award. In June of this year, we were excited to hear we had been Elected for the “Services Excellent for Ontario Award 2014” by the North Bay Chamber of Commerce.
We are currently a team of over 12, working together to give our clients the best possible service. We also have a division in Ottawa which concentrates on providing state of the art business solutions to middle and larger companies.

Our experience is in all fields of technology; Microsoft Operating Systems, Apple products, server (Linux/Windows), infrastructure (cabling), wireless, phones, tablet, ATM, debit machine, website and email hosting, security cameras and more.

All NBCS staff must provide an annual Criminal Check, before they can work on client hardware or software. All staff has signed a Confidentiality Agreement as we take privacy very seriously at NBCS. We encourage our staff to maintain any and all certifications, and provide time for our staff to upgrade and attend further education.

To further protect our clients NBCS maintains $5 Million in Insurance, we also have Errors & Omissions Liability subject to the policy, Cyber-Privacy Failure Expense Coverage and Security Breach/Unauthorized Access/Virus coverage. We have also one of the most secure buildings in Northern Ontario. We take your privacy seriously.
